all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Therefore, gird up your loins, that you may be the children of light, and that day shall not overtake you as a thief.
Doctrine and Covenants 106:5
Quote of the Day
"The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints is the means established by Heavenly Father to access covenants that enable us to return home."
Elder Ricardo P. Giménez | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
